## Matrix3x3.scale() method

Scales a Matrix3x3 by a scalar number component-wise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static scale(a: Matrix3x3, f: number, result?: Matrix3x3): Matrix3x3;
```

The matrix to be scaled.

number


</td><td>

The scalar number.


</td></tr>

result


</td><td>

[Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md)

_(Optional)_ The output matrix (can be the same as a), if not specified, a new matrix will be created.


</td></tr>

[Matrix3x3](doc/markdown/./base.matrix3x3.md)
